description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Clinical Remote Data Capture product of Oracle Health Sciences Applications (component: Forms).   The supported version that is affected is 5.4.0.2. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Clinical Remote Data Capture.  Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in  unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all Oracle Clinical Remote Data Capture accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 6.5 (Confidentiality impacts).  CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N).
